description: Our Individual boxes and cups are a great for small events where you might want each person to have their own. Covid friendly and you don't have to share! Prices are determined based on the number of people for the event.
Assortment of two cheeses, two types of salami, fresh fruit, nuts, sweets, pickles or olives, jam, and crackers.
Just the basics - Assortment of three cheeses, two types of salami, prosciutto, fresh fruit, nuts, jam, garnishes, and crackers on the side.
Assortment of four cheeses, two types of salami, uncured pepperoni, fresh fruit, sweets, nuts, pickles, olives, jam,  garnishes, and crackers on the side.
Assortment of five cheeses, two types of salami, prosciutto, uncured pepperoni, fresh fruit, sweets, nuts, pickles, olives, jams, garnishes, and crackers on the side.
Assortment of six cheeses, three types of salami, prosciutto, uncured pepperoni, dried fruit, nuts, pickles, olives, jams, garnishes, and crackers on the side.
Our Graze Tabes are great for a larger event, such as a wedding appetizer or for a work event - can accommodate 20 to 200 people. Prices are determined based on the number of people for the event.
